description.line1: company activity on LinkedIn. LinkedIn Observer is a machine-learning–powered analytics tool designed to help businesses track industry trends, competitor behavior, and hiring patterns. All scraped and processed from one of the most secure platforms on the web.
description.line2: Built to bypass LinkedIn’s strict data-access limitations, the system gathers public posts and company activity, transforming them into clean, actionable insights for operational and strategic decision-making.

challenge.title: How might we reliably extract structured insights from LinkedIn, a platform intentionally designed to prevent scraping, while keeping the experience seamless for the user?
description: LinkedIn’s aggressive bot-detection systems required a custom ML driven scrapper that mimicked human behavior, handled dynamic content, and avoided rate limits.

features.title: Intelligent Company Tracking
features.description: The dashboard displays each company’s LinkedIn activity at a glance, including: last visited time, last posted time, scrape status, real-time update logs. A streamlined table layout keeps large datasets readable and scannable.

features.title: ML-Powered Post Extraction
features.description: Posts are collected using a machine learning model trained to detect and extract LinkedIn content reliably, even when page structure changes. Each post shows: preview text, timestamp, scrape status, direct links for deeper review.

features.title: Error-Resilient Scrape Logging
features.description: Every action, success, or failure is logged in a transparent "Crawler Logs" view. This gives users confidence in the system, and makes troubleshooting fast and data-driven.

features.title: Clean, Lightweight UI System
features.description: The interface follows a data-first approach: minimal colors, a calm visual hierarchy, and spacious tables. Complex activity data becomes easy to digest without overwhelming the user.

result.title: With this automated LinkedIn intelligence system, the client gained a continuous stream of real-time insights without manual labor or unreliable third-party tools.
description: Efficiency improved, trend-spotting became effortless, and the client now relies on LinkedIn Observer as a critical part of their daily decision-making workflow.

description.line1: for runners seeking precision. Find Race Pace is a web application I designed and developed to provide runners with instant pace calculations and training insights. The project focused on creating a clean, conversion-focused interface that works seamlessly across all devices.
description.line2: Built with modern web technologies, the site prioritizes speed, accessibility, and user experience—delivering complex calculations through a simple, elegant interface that runners can trust.

challenge.title: How might we design a website that instantly converts visitors into users, while maintaining simplicity and delivering precise calculations across all devices and contexts?
description: The core challenge was balancing instant usability with calculation accuracy. The interface needed to be simple enough for a runner to use mid-workout, yet powerful enough to handle complex time-distance conversions reliably.

features.title: Conversion-Focused Design
features.description: The homepage was designed with a single goal: get users calculating instantly. Clear value proposition, minimal friction, and prominent input fields ensure runners can start using the tool within seconds of landing.

features.title: Mobile-First Responsive Layout
features.description: Recognizing that many runners access the site from their phones at the track or gym, I built a fully responsive interface that adapts seamlessly from mobile to desktop, ensuring usability across all screen sizes.

features.title: Performance Optimization
features.description: The site loads in under 2 seconds and performs all calculations instantly client-side. Optimized assets, lazy loading, and efficient code ensure a snappy experience even on slower connections.

features.title: Accessible & SEO-Optimized
features.description: Built with semantic HTML, ARIA labels, and proper heading structure for screen reader compatibility. Meta tags, structured data, and content optimization help runners discover the site through search engines.

result.title: A website that converts visitors into users, delivering value immediately while maintaining peak performance and accessibility standards.
description: The site now serves thousands of runners monthly with a 95+ PageSpeed score and sub-2-second load times. Low bounce rates and high engagement metrics confirm that the design successfully eliminates friction and delivers immediate value to users.

description.line1: the Latest Music Releases. NouZik is a next-generation music discovery and catalog management platform built for fans and professionals who want to stay on top of the latest releases.

challenge.title: How might we create a music discovery interface that feels as intuitive as a streaming app, but with the depth and flexibility of a catalog explorer?
description: The goal was to merge a professional data dashboard feel with consumer grade usability, ensuring that even large datasets (thousands of tracks) remain fast, scannable, and visually engaging.

features.title: Advanced Music Search
features.description: Explore a rich, data-driven search experience that makes discovering new music effortless. Users can filter by artist, label, genre, release date, or format, all displayed in a clean, scannable table layout.

features.title: Track Details View
features.description: The track detail card presents album art, release metadata, and direct links to major streaming platforms like Spotify, Apple Music, and YouTube, all within a compact, modern interface. Users get essential information instantly, without visual noise.

features.title: Personal Dashboard
features.description: NouZik’s dashboard puts control front and center. A simple left-hand navigation gives users quick access to Home, Advanced Search, Upload, and Profile.

features.title: Dark Mode Design System
features.description: NouZik features a refined dark interface built for comfort and focus. The palette of deep grays and subtle accents enhances readability, reduces glare, and maintains a professional, immersive look across every page.

result.title: With our AI-driven solution, support requests dropped, product recommendations improved sales, and engagement rose quickly.
description: The client achieved measurable growth and a scalable system that now drives consistent business results.
